meanings.definition: Biquadratics: involving the fourth power of a variable
meanings.sent1: The biquadratics equation required us to raise the variable to the fourth power.
meanings.sent2: The biquadratics concept deals with variables raised to the fourth power.
meanings.sent3: When the teacher mentioned biquadratics, I imagined a variable flexing its fourth power muscles!
meanings.sent4: The complexity of biquadratics is like navigating through a dense forest of fourth powers.
meanings.sent5: The biquadratics rule is as sharp and powerful as a sword made of fourth powers.

meanings.definition: Biquadratics: a polynomial equation of the fourth degree
meanings.sent1: Solving the biquadratics involved finding the roots of a fourth-degree polynomial.
meanings.sent2: The biquadratics equation was a challenging fourth-degree polynomial problem.
meanings.sent3: The biquadratics equation walked into the math party like a cool fourth-degree polynomial.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of biquadratics was as clear as a sunny day in a fourth-degree polynomial field.
meanings.sent5: The biquadratics problem was a mountain to climb, with its peak at the fourth degree.
